alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 4:37AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron affecting Crawford, Houston, Bibb and Peach Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, Juliette, Dames Ferry, Macon, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding of woodlands occurs upstream and downstream from the gage on Houston Road. Portions of creek access roads and low lying areas will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 15.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 15 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
